## SfStablecoinStore.start() method

Start monitoring the blockchain for protocol state changes.

**Signature:**

```typescript
start(): () => void;
```
**Returns:**

() =&gt; void

Function to stop the monitoring.

## Remarks

The [onLoaded](./stablecoin-lib-base.sfstablecoinstore.onloaded.md) callback will be called after the state is fetched for the first time.

Use the [subscribe()](./stablecoin-lib-base.sfstablecoinstore.subscribe.md) function to register listeners.
